page.title: 02Typical schoolday by Jason
page.content: I wake up at 7 o'clock and get up at 7.45.Mum makes my breakfast and packs my packed lunch.At 8.30 I catch the school bus and arrive at school at 8.45.We go into school at about 9 o'clock and for 20 minutes we have a tutorial session when the register is taken. Each lesson lasts for 35 minutes and we have a 15 minute breaktime.There are 4 lessons in the morning. Lunchtime is from 12.00 to 1.00 and we go in about 12.30.There are 4 afternoon lessons again of 35 minutes length.School finishes at 3.35.I catch the school bus home.I arrive back at 4.00 have a cup of tea and then my mum goes to work at 4.30.I start my homework then and my dad makes our tea at 5.30.Mum arrives back at 7 o'clock has her tea and I wash up.I go to bed at 9.30.My favourite day is thursday we have Design all day.
